verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] decided to refer every person caught crossing the border illegally for federal prosecution , a policy that could result in the separation of far more parents from their children at the border . The move would also mean that even if immigrants caught at the border illegally have valid asylum claims , they could still end up with federal criminal convictions on their record regardless of whether a judge eventually finds they have a right to live and stay in the US .
